verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}On a hill far away stood an old rugged cross, The emblem of suff’ring and shame, And I love that old cross where the Dearest and Best For a world of lost sinners was slain.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To the old rugged cross, I will ever be true Its shame and reproach gladly bear Then he'll call me someday to my home far away Where his glory forever I'll share.{/lang-eng}
